in_favor: Women spend more time on unpaid domestic and care work, with the ratio of women to men being 7:9.
In Western Asia and Latin America and the Caribbean, there are 4 and 7 countries respectively with 80% or more women making their own decisions regarding sexual health.
The proportion of women who make these decisions ranges from 38% in sub-Saharan Africa to 82% in Eastern and South-Eastern Asia.
against: Women do not have the same level of autonomy when it comes to family planning, with one in four unable to make healthcare decisions or say no to sex.
The proportion of women who can autonomously decide to use contraception is 89%, but this varies significantly by region and household wealth.
